name: HookMeUp
description:
Entry for the GMTK GameJam 2018. 

It is a Racing Game but you cant Drive or Run, luckily you got a Grappling Hook.

Using A*Pathfinding Plugin from https://arongranberg.com/astar/

Tools Used: Unity, Google Blocks and Reason

Julian Heinken - @Schneckerstein

Jonathan Held - @GamesByHeld

Daniel Gehn - @CyberHamburger
